```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(shiny)
library(rphylotastic)
```

User interface: Building the web doc 
```{r}

ui <- fluidPage(titlePanel("Phylotastic Educational Resources"), tags$br(), h3("I want to"), tags$br(),actionButton("phylo", "Choose Among Previously Constructed Phylogenies"), tags$br(), actionButton("own", "Choose My Own Organisms!"))
  
```

Instructions for the server
```{r}
server <- function(input,output) {observeEvent(input$phylo, {output$ui <- renderUI({is.null(input$radioButtons("dynamic", "Dynamic", choices = c("By State"="option1", "Popular Mammals"="option 2"), selected = "option 1"))})}
```

knitting UI and Server instructions
```{r}
shinyApp(ui = ui, server=server)
```
